author: p0W3RH311
body:
operator of type -as and -is that would be Useful to have -notis


```
PS C:\> 'hello' -is [int]
False
PS C:\> !('hello' -is [int])
True
PS C:\> 'hello' -notis [int]
True
```

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: Before suggesting new language features you might want to spend a wee bit more time looking to see if the feature already exists.  In this case, try `-isnot`.  :-)

comments.author: rkeithhill
comments.body: Cool.  BTW **if** you are satisfied with the existing `-isnot` operator you can close this issue.

title: Introduce a -notis operator
